vrt::_BadCast

vrt::_BadCast Class Reference

Internal Use Only: Minimal wrapper of std::bad_cast that is used to avoid "virtual base inaccessible" warnings when building under GCC with -Wextra turned on. More...

#include <VRTObject.h>

Inheritance diagram for vrt::_BadCast:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Internal Use Only: Minimal wrapper of std::bad_cast that is used to avoid "virtual base inaccessible" warnings when building under GCC with -Wextra turned on.
